name: Hoki Found -Waterproof Pet Feeding Mats with High Lips - Multiple Size and Colors for Dogs, Cats & Others-G

other_info.Target Audience: Small Animals, Bird, Cat, Dog, Insect

about_this_item: Made from High-quality & Non-Toxic Silicone. 100% PVC & BPA-free.
Clean up easily by rinsing or under the sink, or simply wipe down the mat with a wet cloth. Dries up quickly and is dishwasher safe.
SIZE: 19“ x 12”. Extra High Raised Edge. A thicker brand than similar ones.
Extra High raised outer lip prevents food, water and treats from spilling onto your clean floors! Please refer to measurements for size.No more messy spills on floor again.
Anti-slip, Non skid, Waterproof, Durable, Flexible,Soft and easily taken anywhere for travel.

title: Very nice, but could be sturdier
content: This mat is great for keeping food and water bowls from sliding around and spilling on the floor. It's easy to clean and stays in place on wood and laminate surfaces.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: My only piece of criticism is that the raised edges are very soft and do not prevent things like brooms and vacuums from deforming the mat. If you have a robot vacuum, it'll get caught on this mat and try to suck up the corners. If spills occur, be very careful picking up the mat or it will fold up on you.  Otherwise, its easy to use and provides extra grip for food and water bowls that wouldwise slide around.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024

title: Nice tray but packaging needs improvement
content: It's a nice tray to protect the floor with plenty of room for food and water dishes.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The mat comes rolled and zip tied. Cutting the zip tie risks damaging the mat. A twist tie would be better.

title: Easy to clean
content: The gray color fades into the background without drawing much attention, and it's very easy to clean.  The little paw shape at the corner is a cute little touch.  No more pet food pieces staining my stone patio floor.

title: Verified Purchase

title: Served Our Purpose
content: I am using this silicone tray as a nail care tray/desk protector. I cannot comment on how I think it functions as a pet food/water bowl tray. That said, I LOVE it for how I am using it! I wanted something to protect the surface of my desk when I wanted to do my nails. After looking at hard, cafeteria-style trays, I realized silicone would be much easier for storage/cleaning/etc. I found some mats without edges/ridges, but I really wanted a tray with a lip or edge to catch any spills. This silicone tray rolls up and lays flat very easily. It is closer to a silicone baking sheet in stiffness than what one might expect from silicone in this shape/size.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: For my needs, this thin quality is perfect as I can roll the mat up and use a fabric hair tie to hold it closed (like an old-timey map or scroll!) I have no need to pick up the tray when it is full of objects/tools, and it would not be possible given its floppy (not flimsy) nature. However, once cleared of the larger objects, picking up the tray with dirty brushes and tools that need to be cleaned and any spilled polishes/powders/etc is very easy, like taking a placemat to the sink to dispose of the crumbs - easy peasy. After cleaning the tray I lay a little clean towel over it to air dry the cleaned implements and tools on. Then, it gets rolled up and stored away with all my other nail supplies - fits right into my polish tote bag.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2024

title: Perfect for my usage!
content: So far it has protected my desk/kitchen table/deck and patio and other surfaces from the throes and inaccuracies of my nail art passion. Sharp tools and nail scissors have fallen onto it without damage, it has taken various nail polishes, stains, powders, adhesives, and countless acetone spills. I'm sure it won't last forever and will take damage, and ultimately fail and be disposed of, one day. But, that is why I purchased it - sometimes you just need a paper plate instead of a ceramic one. (That was a metaphor, don't complain about sustainability and eco-responsibility - let the analogy land.)
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2024
